title: PartyTalk Turkey Burlap Door Hanger Thanksgiving Turkey Door Sign Garden Flag for Fall Thanksgiving Decorations, Holiday Front Door Decor 20 x 22 Inch
features: ◆SIZE - Our Turkey Burlap Door Decor measures 20in x 22in, large enough and just right for hanging on your front door, really shows well even from a distance
◆MATERIAL - This Thanksgiving Turkey Door Hanger is well made of premium quality burlap and hand painted with waterproof paint, durable and attractive, will definitely last for years
◆STYLE - Great for Thanksgiving, Christmas, holiday, family dinner, harvest decor. Also can be as a burlap thanksgiving garden flag or a gift for your family or friends
◆OCCASIONS - The Holiday Door Hanger is ideal for hanging on your front door, entry door, storm door, pantry door, wall, is the perfect way to start Thanksgiving fun
◆DESIGN - The Decorative Door Hanger is stuffed with soft polyester fibers, to create a rich and 3D look, feel a lifelike turkey. Features various colors, vibrant and festive
description: ◆It is during this time of the year we reflect on how much we have to be thankful for, just right this Turkey is a symbol of "Grateful, Thankful, Blessed", you can celebrate your time with family and friends, letting all your loved ones know they are welcome in your home with this festive Thanksgiving door decorations.

◆1. There is a jute hook on the backside for you easily hanging this adorable turkey hanger on anywhere, like the front door, wall, window, etc. Please note back side of this fall door hanger is blank.
◆2. You can use it as a burlap turkey garden flag to decorate your Thanksgiving fall house, garden, yard, patio, porch, veranda, lawn, mailbox, apartment, classroom, office and so on.

◆3. This door hanger will add some fall to your door after the Halloween decor has come down and before the Christmas decor can go up. You'll be the envy of all your neighbors when you hang this bright turkey door hanger!

◆4. You can hang the burlap hanger from the front door so that the little ones in your family will get a real treat when they come for Thanksgiving dinner. Or make an awesome hostess gift if you are visiting someone for Thanksgiving!
◆Folding packing, so when the Thanksgiving Door Hanger arrives, you could iron the surface with low heat to make it more perfect, and you can use it again and again.

title: Bigger than expected and great quality.
